ostrowski

Class OstrowskiAutomaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.brics.automaton.Automaton
      • ostrowski.OstrowskiAutomaton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alg1Automaton, Alg2Automaton, Alg3Automaton

    abstract class OstrowskiAutomaton
extends Automaton
    The automaton base class. Explanation for Input range: The range of the input might vary based on the position of the input. For example, in recognition automaton for rt3 Ostrowski numeration system, the first input can range from 0 to 1, the second can range from 0 to 2, the third can range from 0 to 1, etc.. In this case, the inputRange would be {{1},{2}}, the maxRange would be {2}, and the repeatBeginIndex would be 0. For another example, in algorithm 1 of addition automaton for an Ostrowski numeration system with continuous fraction [5,1,2;3,4] with [3,4] being the repeating part, The input Range would be {{10,5},{2,1},{4,2},{6,3},{8,4}}
